text: ql -ayha alrswl- lmshrky qawmak aladhin ankru ealayk alduea' bqwlk: ya allah ya rhmn, adeuu allh, 'aw adeuu alrhmn, fabi'ayi 'asmayih dewtmwh fa'iinakum tadeun rbana wahdana; li'ana asma'h klha hsna. wala tajhar balqra't fi slatk, fysmek almshrkwn, wala tusirr biha fala ysmek ashabk, wakun wstana bayn aljahr walhms
